title: Tuffy’s Pet Foods’ Pet Food Manufacturing Facility, Perham, Minnesota
text:
Production Capacity 180,000t Owner Tuffy’s Pet Foods 
Tuffy's Pet Foods, the pet food manufacturing division of KLN Family Brands, opened a new state-of-the-art manufacturing facility in the city of Perham, Minnesota, in August 2015. 
The $70m investment, which is an expansion to the existing plant in Perham, is aimed to meet the changing expectations in the pet food industry in terms of food and microbiological safety, by expanding and upgrading the company's production facilities. 
The new purpose-built facility provides the safest environment for food safety, efficiency and flexibility, and meets the stringent requirements of the current pet food market. 
Established in 1964, Tuffy's Pet Foods produces dry dog and cat food kibble for its own national brands, NutriSource, Pure Vita and Natural Planet as well as for other co-manufactured products. The current plant is the company's only plant in Perham that produces pet food. 
Pure Foods announced plans to establish its US headquarters and manufacturing facility in Kingsport city in Tennessee in March 2015. It will be the company's fourth facility in North America. Tuffy's Pet Foods' manufacturing facility details 
The 130,000ft² state-of-the-art manufacturing facility houses completely segregated processes and is equipped with latest, technologically-advanced equipment. It comprises approximately 180,000ft² of production and warehouse space. 
The processing and packaging areas in the plant are made of pre-stressed concrete walls with a rubber roof. The plant features four packaging lines with packaging systems designed to be flexible for blending and conveying. Of the four, two lines will be moved from the existing facility and a new high-speed large line and a new small line with a bundler will be installed in future. 
Three extrusion lines have been installed at the plant initially and enough space is provided to accommodate a fourth extrusion line in future. 
The plant has the capacity to produce more than 180,000t of product, which is 50% more than the original facility. Once the new plant becomes fully operational, the old plant will be converted into warehouse and an expansion of soft moist treat capacity.
